sentence: Among the many who will take the stage when the time comes: Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, Andrew Clyde and Jody Nice all Georgia Republicans, of course along with David Perdue, former U.S. senator from Georgia and now a candidate for governor; state Sen. Burt Jones, a candidate for lieutenant governor; and football great Herschel Walker, a Heisman Trophy winner and now a candidate for the U.S. Senate.
author: Jennifer Harper
title: The collapse in economic confidence under President Biden
